dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of images of clothing items, designed as a drop-in replacement for the original MNIST dataset, providing a more challenging benchmark for machine learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: FashionMNIST

dcterms:description: A dataset for traffic sign detection and classification, containing images of traffic signs from various locations around the world.
dcterms:title: Mapillary Traffic Sign Dataset (MTSD)

dcterms:description: A collection of time series datasets for classification tasks, providing a benchmark for time series analysis.
dcterms:title: UCR Time Series Dataset

dcterms:description: A derived dataset from MNIST, consisting of images that have been rotated to create a new challenge for classification tasks.
dcterms:title: Rotated MNIST

dcterms:description: A derived dataset from FashionMNIST, where images are randomly placed on a black background to create a new challenge for classification tasks.
dcterms:title: Random Placement FashionMNIST

dcterms:description: A specific dataset from the UCR Time Series Dataset, containing measurements of engine noise over time for classifying car faults.
